Invisibility: In this scenario, people could turn invisible at will, allowing them to move around undetected and communicate without the need for any physical means.
Mind-reading: People could develop the ability to read minds, allowing them to communicate telepathically without the need for any physical means.
Telekinesis: People could use their telekinetic abilities to move objects and people long distances, allowing for instant communication and interaction.
Time-travel: People could travel through time, allowing them to communicate with people in the past or future, even if the phones were not working.
Interdimensional communication: People could use their ability to communicate across different dimensions, allowing them to communicate with people in other realities or universes.
